relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

relproducts.title: Uniview 3200 Dune Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their dune cream is a timeless neutral cream tone, perfect for any decor.

relproducts.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Simple, soft and warm, their bella blackout cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.

relproducts.title: Bella Blackout Smoke Blue Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This smoke blue panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
